description:
The os api extension 'os-volumes', does not implement the feature to create a volume from a snapshot. The EC2 api's support this feature (see euca-create-volume). 

Actually the mechanism already exists in the nova.volume module, the 'os-volumes' extension need to be updated to pass the snapshot id (if provided), when creating a volume.
title: Create volume from snapshot using OSAPI
